testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Call] DUT user calls PSTN user from Dialpad(Hard Keys for LCP)

steps.action: Observe Home screen,DUT user pickup the handset and dial a PSTN number with the hard keys and wait for auto dial. PSTN user picks up the call
expectedResult: Verify that when user picks up the handset then dial pad opens up.
Verify that that call is auto dialed within 4 secs after typing the correct PSTN number.
Call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: PSTN user disconnects the call
expectedResult: U2: Call should be disconnected  and DUT user navigates to home page.

steps.action: On Home screen, DUT user pickup the handset and dial a PSTN number from soft key dial pad. PSTN user picks up the call
expectedResult: user picks up the handset then dial pad opens up and user can type the numbers from soft keys.

steps.action: DUT user disconnects the call
expectedResult: Verify that call is disconnected properly, and DUT user navigate to home screen.

steps.action: U2: User tap on Dialpad icon on bottom right corner of recent tab/ favorite tab
expectedResult: U2: Landscape: Dial pad displayed to left side and recent/ favorite tab to right side.
Portrait: Dialpad should open at full screen
Back navigation button should be available on screen when Dialpad is open.

steps.action: User dial a PSTN number using soft keys on screen
expectedResult: PSTN user receive the call
Two way communication start between PSTN user and DUT user

steps.action: Note: When DUT user enters more than 3 digits and leaving the device idle a call is initiated and announces as "we couldn't complete the call", if it is an invalid number.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user calls Teams Client user using Dialpad

steps.action: Dial the DID of the  Client user from the Dial pad
expectedResult: Call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.
U2: Landscape: Calls tab-->Dial pad displayed to left side and recent/ favorite tab to right side of the screen.

steps.action: Verify Call UI are visible.
expectedResult: Hold, Transfer, Mic on, more option should be displayed for the full duration of the call.

steps.action: DUT user disconnects the call.
expectedResult: Call should be disconnected and DUT user navigated to calls tab.

steps.action: Note: In C455HD , Dialpad is not opening properly as per design in lower end devices

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user calls PSTN user from Favorite tab and Recent tab

steps.action:
DUT user calls the PSTN from speed dial.
U2 Landscape: Dial pad displayed to left side and recent/ favorite tab to right side
Portrait: Calls tab-->Favorite / recent tab should display

DUT user calls the PSTN from Favorite tab
expectedResult: Call should  connect properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: PSTN user disconnects the call
expectedResult: Verify Call should  disconnect and DUT user navigated to favorite tab.

steps.action:
U2: DUT user dials PSTN user from recent call history.
U2: User should be selected from the recent call history. Call icon, contact card &
add to favorites icons should be displayed.
expectedResult: Verify Call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: PSTN user disconnects the call
expectedResult: Verify Call should  disconnect and DUT user navigated to recent tab.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user call is rejected by TDC

steps.action: DUT user calls TDC user.
expectedResult: Verify DID number is displaying in the pre calling screen of the DUT.
And TDC should start ringing.

steps.action: TDC user Rejects the call.
expectedResult: DUT user should be redirected to VM and able to leave voicemail successfully.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user to make 2nd call

steps.action: DUT user makes a call to TDC-1.
expectedResult: TDC-1 picks the call and connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: DUT user can make another call while already in a call.
expectedResult: DUT user should call TDC-2.

steps.action: DUT user initiate 2nd call to TDC 2
expectedResult: 1st call should go to hold and the second Call should connect properly with a 2-way audio.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user to dial from hard key pad irrespective of the UI view

steps.action: DUT user is on calendar tab
expectedResult: Scheduled meetings should be displayed

steps.action: User press speaker button and dials the number from hard keypad
expectedResult: Dial pad should be displayed if user press the speaker button. User should be able to dial the numbers from hard keypad to place the call.

steps.action: Place the call after switching handset/headset/speaker mode
expectedResult: Verify that the call is placed, even after switching the handset/headset/speaker mode

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] Verify call history for a newly created user

steps.action: Sign-in with newly created user account into DUT.
expectedResult: New user should be successfully signed in.

steps.action: Verify the App for data in the Calls and Voicemail tabs.
expectedResult: New user should not have any data in Calls and Voicemail tabs.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user handle the call upgrade from audio to Video by Teams client

steps.action: DUT user calls TDC and TDC accepts the call
expectedResult: The call should be established between DUT user and TDC user with two-way audio.
Verify that DUT user does not have Chat and video option on the call entry window and on call roaster once the call is connected successfully.

steps.action: Verify TDC user enables video during the call.
expectedResult: Verify that even though device does not support video, 2 -way audio continues to flow without any glitch.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Call] DUT user continues the call without issues when client shares Desktop

steps.action: DUT user calls TDC user and TDC accepts the call
expectedResult: Call is connected between DUT user and TDC user with two-way audio.

steps.action: TDC user shares the screen
expectedResult: Shared screen should not reflect on DUT and should not drop out from the call. Two-way audio communication should flow continuously between Client App user and TDC user when screen is being shared by the TDC user.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] Auto dial PSTN number from on-hook and off -hook

steps.action: DUT user dials PSTN with hard key and wait for auto dialing
expectedResult: U2: Verify that dial pad opens up and start auto dialing within 3 secs after typing numbers.

steps.action: PSTN user picks up the call
expectedResult: Verify that call is connected with 2-way audio

steps.action: DUT user picks up the handset (Off-Hook).
expectedResult: U2: Verify that dial pad opens up and user should hear the dial tone.

steps.action: DUT user dials PSTN number from hard key and wait for auto dialing
expectedResult: DUT should start auto dialing within 3 secs after typing the numbers.

steps.action: PSTN user picks up the call
expectedResult: Verify that call is connected with 2-way audio and audio is flowing through handset on the device.

steps.action: Shared steps: Navigate to calls tab
expectedResult: U2: Landscape: Calls tab should be displayed with favorite & recent tabs to right side of the screen and Dialpad to left side.

steps.action: DUT user select a contact
expectedResult: Call should be connected successfully with two-way audio.

steps.action: DUT user disconnect the call
expectedResult: Call should be disconnected gracefully, and DUT user should be navigated to recent tab.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user calls Teams Client user using Dialpad

steps.action: Dial the DID of the Teams Client user from the Dial pad
expectedResult: Call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: Verify Call UI are visible.
expectedResult: Hold, Transfer, Mic on, more option should be displayed for the full duration of the call.

steps.action: DUT user disconnects the call.
expectedResult: Call should be disconnected gracefully, and DUT user should be navigated to calls tab.

steps.action: Note: In C455HD , Dialpad is not opening properly as per design in lower end devices

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user calls PSTN user from Favorite tab and Recent tab

steps.action: DUT user calls the PSTN from speed dial.
expectedResult: Verify call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: PSTN user disconnects the call
expectedResult: Verify Call should be disconnected gracefully, and DUT user should be navigated to favorite tab.

steps.action: U2: DUT user dials PSTN user from recent call history.
expectedResult: Verify Call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: PSTN user disconnects the call
expectedResult: Verify Call should be disconnected gracefully, and DUT user should be navigated to recent tab.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user to make 2nd call

steps.action: DUT user makes call to TDC-1.
expectedResult: TDC-1 answers and the call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

steps.action: DUT user can make another call while already in a call.
expectedResult: DUT user should be able to call TDC-2.

steps.action: DUT user initiate 2nd call to TDC 2
expectedResult: 1st call should go to hold and the second Call should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user to dial from hard key pad irrespective of the UI view

steps.action: DUT user is on calendar tab
expectedResult: Scheduled meetings should be displayed.

steps.action: User press speaker button and dials the number from hard keypad or directly able to dial from hard key pad to place the call.
expectedResult: Dial pad should be displayed if user press the speaker button. User should be able to dial the numbers from hard keypad to place the call.

steps.action: Place the call after switching the handset/headset/speaker mode
expectedResult: Verify that the call is placed, even after switching the handset/headset/speaker mode

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] Verify call history for a newly created user

steps.action: Sign-in with newly created user account into DUT.
expectedResult: New user should be successfully signed in.

steps.action: Verify the App for data in the Calls and Voicemail tabs.
expectedResult: New user should not have any data in Calls and Voicemail tabs.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user handle the call upgrade from audio to Video by Teams client

steps.action: DUT user calls TDC and call is answered by the TDC
expectedResult: The call should be established between DUT user and TDC user with two-way audio.

steps.action: Verify TDC user enables video during the call.
expectedResult: Verify that even though device does not support video, 2 -way audio continues to flow without any glitch.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] DUT user continues the call without issues when Teams client shares Desktop

steps.action: DUT user calls TDC user and call is answered by TDC
expectedResult: Call should be established between DUT user and TDC user with two-way audio.

steps.action: TDC user shares its desktop.
expectedResult: Shared screen should not reflect on DUT and should not drop out from the call. Two-way audio communication should continuously flow between Teams App user and TDC user when screen is being shared by the TDC user.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] Auto dial PSTN number from on-hook and off -hook

steps.action: DUT user dials PSTN number from hard key and wait for auto dialing
expectedResult: U2: Verify that dial pad opens up and start auto dialing within 3 secs of typing the numbers.

steps.action: PSTN user picks up the call
expectedResult: Verify that call is connected with 2-way audio

steps.action: DUT user picks up the handset (Off-Hook).
expectedResult: U2: Verify that dial pad opens up and user should hear the dial tone.

steps.action: DUT user dials PSTN number from hard key and wait for auto dialing
expectedResult: DUT should start auto dialing within 3 secs of typing the numbers.

steps.action: PSTN user picks up the call
expectedResult: Verify that call is connected with 2-way audio and audio is flowing through handset on the device.

testCaseTitle: [Outgoing Calls] User to test soft key and Hard key dial Pad

steps.action: DUT user press on Speaker button
expectedResult: Verify that dial pad is opened, and number can be dialed.

steps.action: DUT user dials the numbers from 0 to 9 including “+” by long press of “0” through soft keys. (the intention here is user can dial a PSTN call from soft dial pad. E.g +1234567890)
expectedResult: DUT should accept the inputs from the soft Keypad and the numbers typed should be visible on the screen.

steps.action: User clicks on place call icon
expectedResult: Tapping on the place call icon should start dialing.

steps.action: DUT user is able to dial the numbers from hard keys .
expectedResult: Device should accept the inputs from the hard Keypad and should be visible on the screen.

steps.action: User can place a call after pressing the hard keys
expectedResult: User should be able to place the call and should be connected properly with a 2-way audio.
